metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44509 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to the YottaDB code base). Using crafted input, attackers can cause an integer underflow of the size of calls to memset in op_fnj3 in sr_port/op_fnj3.c in order to cause a segmentation fault and crash the application.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
